doc:
Karen Allen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karen_Allen 0 Karen Jane Allen (born October 5, 1951) is an American film and stage actress. After making her film debut in Animal House (1978), she became best known for her portrayal of Marion Ravenwood opposite Harrison Ford in Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981), a role she later reprised for Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008). She also co-starred in Starman (1984) and Scrooged (1988). Her stage work has included performances on Broadway. Karen_Jane_Allen ( born October_5_,_1951 ) is an_American_film_and_stage_actress . After making her_film_debut in Animal_House_(_1978_) , she became best_known for her_portrayal of Marion_Ravenwood_opposite_Harrison_Ford in Raiders of the_Lost_Ark ( 1981_) , a_role she later reprised for Indiana_Jones and the_Kingdom of the_Crystal_Skull_(_2008_) . She also co-starred in Starman_(_1984_) and Scrooged_(_1988_) . Her_stage_work has_included performances on Broadway .
